answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.reference: We will take all reasonable precautions to ensure that all the personal data that is submitted to us for the purposes above remains secure... PRIVACY NOTICE
This privacy notice (Privacy Notice) sets out the ways in which Komodo Learning Ltd (we, us, our) collect, use and share your personal data (your information) in connection with our publishing business. It also explains what rights you have to access or change your personal data.
Komodo Learning Ltd publishes digital teaching and learning resources including on-line resources via on-line platforms such as Komodo Maths and the Kickstart Maths Quiz system.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects data such as mobile network information, unique device identifiers, browser type, referral source, length of visit to the website, number of page reviews, search queries, and similar information.

content: length of visit to the website

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the specific types of data collected if the app declares the collection of data.
reply.reference: mobile network information, unique device identifiers, browser type, referral source, length of visit to the website, number of page reviews, the search queries you make on the website and similar information. URL: https://komodomath.com/general/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use in various scenarios, such as responding to queries, administering accounts, conducting research, measuring advertising effectiveness, delivering relevant advertising, personalizing services, improving security, and more.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly outlines the different purposes for which data is collected and used by the app, indicating a transparent declaration of intentions.
reply.reference: The privacy policy document explicitly states the various purposes for data collection and use such as responding to queries, administering accounts, conducting research, measuring advertising effectiveness, delivering relevant advertising, personalizing services, improving security, and more. URL: https://komodomath.com/general/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data by contacting the company. The user also has the right to request deletion, restriction, or correction of their information.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have the right to request deletion, restriction, or correction of their information by reaching out to the company, indicating that users can opt out of data collection or delete data.
reply.reference: the right to ask us, in certain circumstances, to delete information we hold about you; the right to ask us, in certain circumstances, to restrict processing of your information. You may exercise your rights and choices by contacting us using the details above 'Who We Are'. URL: https://komodomath.com/general/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with specialist education research partners, prospective sellers or buyers of businesses or assets, and other third parties including legal advisors, regulatory authorities, courts, and government agencies.

content: prospective sellers or buyers of businesses or assets
legal advisors, regulatory authorities, courts, government agencies

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the specific third parties with whom the app may share data, including education research partners, legal advisors, regulatory authorities, and more.
reply.reference: specialist education research partners to help us create our educational analysis tools and products; any prospective seller or buyer of businesses or assets; any other third parties (including legal or other advisors, regulatory authorities, courts, and government agencies) where necessary to enable us to enforce our legal rights or to protect the rights, property or safety of our employees or where such disclosure may be permitted or required by law or where we have a legal obligation to do so. URL: https://komodomath.com/general/privacy-policy
